title: ICAI Mandates Preceding Year Audit Details for UDIN Generation
content:
# ICAI Mandates Preceding Year Audit Details for UDIN Generation

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI), through its UDIN Directorate, ne UDIN generation ke process mein ek naya mandatory requirement announce kiya hai.

Yahan par key details hain:

*   **New Requirement:** As of December 23, 2025, succeeding auditors ko ab "GST & Tax Audit" aur "Audit & Assurance Functions" categories ke under UDIN generate karte waqt preceding year ke audit se related details provide karna mandatory hoga.
*   **Purpose:** ICAI Council ke 442nd meeting mein (May 26-27, 2025) liye gaye iss decision ka aim audit continuity aur verification standards ko enhance karna hai.
*   **Confidentiality:** ICAI ne members ko assured kiya hai ki furnish ki gayi saari information confidential rahegi aur use disseminate ya share nahi kiya jayega.
*   **Benefit:** Iss procedural update se audit quality improve hogi aur UDIN framework ki robustness badhegi.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://udin.icai.org/whats_new)

*Published on: 24 December 2025*
